text: Jaclyn Bradley is an American singer-songwriter, music therapist, and founder of Rock Town Music Academy. She and her songs have been featured on television shows such as Breaking Bonaduce, The Rachel Zoe Project, The Voice of Holland, and films. She led the largest study in history to research music therapy in surgery, published in the Journal of Clinical Oncology. In 2020, she founded the music school, Rock Town Music Academy. == References == Category:American folk singers Category:singer-songwriters Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people
title: Jaclyn Bradley
